item.description:
Karaoke Happy Hour @ Karaoke Shout now in Astoria! DETAILS BELOW!

BYOB- Please feel free to bring a bottle or food of your choice to share, the Karaoke place may not have their bar open yet by Friday. I will be bringing a bottle, cups, and possibly some chips for the group.

COST: The cost of the Karaoke will be $13.00 per person, this price includes taxes and fees.

HOW TO PAY
The way the paypal feature on this website works is that in order to RSVP for the event you must make the payment first. THIS IS THE NEW event page for the Karaoke night and YOU MUST MAKE PAYMENT & RE-RSVP at this page so that payment is received and I can pay for the room on Thursday night.


Location:
32-46 Steinway St.
(near the corner of Broadway)
Astoria, NY 11103
item.name: NEW FRIDAY Karaoke Happy Hour... RE-RSVP HERE!!!
